name: Table Fighter Online
description:
Table Fighter is the premier fighting card game with no randomness. Select a character from a wide and diverse roster, and then stack your deck in competitive online matches. Table Fighter has been featured in numerous gaming events and major fighting game tournaments, and the original eight characters can now be played for free online.

https://www.tablefighter.com/

Join our passionate online community, which hosts frequent tournaments via our Discord server. https://discord.gg/PCSwYKg
